message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,500. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much money as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $12,000 for the product. It's a high-quality item, and I'm confident it will bring you significant value.

Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering its value and my budget.
